hero.description: Where artificial intelligence meets artisanal perfumery to craft your uniquely personal fragrance.

cta.description: Join the olfactory revolution where AI and masterful craftsmanship create the perfect fragrance for you.

testimonials.description: Discover how fraganz.ai has revolutionized the olfactory experience for our most discerning clients.

testimonial1.title: Creative Director
testimonial1.quote: I never thought a fragrance could so perfectly capture my personality. It's as if they read my soul.

testimonial2.title: Entrepreneur
testimonial2.quote: The blend of technology and craftsmanship is extraordinary. My fragrance is unique and sophisticated.

testimonial3.title: Architect
testimonial3.quote: Every time I wear my fraganz.ai fragrance, I get compliments. It's truly exceptional.

ingredients.description: We select the purest and rarest ingredients from around the world to create unparalleled luxury fragrances.

top_notes.name: Radiant Opening
top_notes.description: Sicilian Bergamot, Amalfi Lemon, and Bulgarian Rose Petals for a bright, memorable opening.

heart_notes.name: Aromatic Heart
heart_notes.description: Jasmine from Grasse, Florentine Iris, and rare spices that define your fragrance's unique character.

base_notes.name: Profound Base
base_notes.description: Cambodian Oud, Mystical Sandalwood, and Ambergris for an unforgettable, long-lasting trail.

process.description: We fuse centuries of artisanal mastery with cutting-edge algorithms to create fragrances that capture your unique essence.

step1.title: Personality Analysis
step1.description: Our AI analyzes your preferences, memories, and personality to identify your unique aromatic profile.

step2.title: Artisanal Formulation
step2.description: Master perfumists interpret the AI's data to create exclusive formulas with premium ingredients.

step3.title: Personalized Creation
step3.description: Each fragrance is one-of-a-kind, crafted specifically for you and your personal story.

footer.description: Revolutionizing perfumery with artificial intelligence and traditional craftsmanship to create unique, personalized fragrances.
footer.copyright: All rights reserved. Crafting unique fragrances with artificial intelligence.
